level.heading: Projections removable.
level.text: ยง 27-310 Projections removable. All projections permitted beyond the street line by the provisions of this subchapter shall be constructed so that they may be removed at any time without endangering the structural safety or fire safety of the building except that footings as permitted under subdivision (a) of section 27-314 of article nine of this subchapter need not be removable.
